website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable and stylish sneaker, the low-top Adidas Lite Racer Adapt can be an excellent addition to an arsenal of kicks. It is a running-inspired sneaker that can work well with different outfits. Adidas brings comfort and style that are packaged in a very budget-friendly rate in this shoe.
pros: The majority of the users have lauded the Adidas Lite Racer Adapt for delivering certain comfort
It is among the Adidas sneakers that have received praise from most customers because of its stylish design
Many wearers have testified that it is a lightweight shoe
A few purchasers have noted that the Lite Racer Adapt has amazing quality
It enables the foot to easily slip into the shoe, as per a couple of wearers
The Adidas Lite Racer Adapt is up for grabs at a budget-friendly pricing point
cons: A few reviewers mentioned that the low-top Adidas Lite Racer Adapt fits narrow at the band area
It has no arch support, according to a customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes ever! No laces, easy slip ones. Working as a CNA in a nursing home, on my feet 12 hours a day, walking on average 8 miles in those shoes. Highly recommend them- getting another pair!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: This product came in a completely broken box, and one shoe is larger than the other due to a sewing defect on the top of the sneaker. The shoe also doesn’t fit right for whatever reason as the right shoe is too large around the ankle and the left shoe is too small. The indent on the top of the sneaker is it normal and when you put it on its forms weird and feels very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: was sent men's sizes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 11 in womens in the coral version of this shoe and was sent 11 in mens because when i tried the shoe on it was about 2 inches to long. Kept them anyways and gave them to my husband. going to try and order the black and rose gold ones, hopefully it doesn't happen with them too.
customer_reviews.author: Tina McCall

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe, but not for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been admiring these shoes in the store for a while now. Unfortunately. those on display in a store are probably a size 6 or 7 and I need a 9. Shoes lose much of their cuteness as they get bigger. Ultimately, I decided to send them back as I felt they looked wide and just plain large on my foot. I love the color combo of the black and coral though.
customer_reviews.author: kew

customer_reviews.title: My suggestion:Order half size down from reg shoe sz
customer_reviews.text: Cool shoes but a little to big. I wear a womens sz 8 and I definitely should’ve ordered a 7.5.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: So comfy, Size down
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great sneaker! One size too large. For real. Order a size down. I sent back for a different size but I wear these daily now. Incredibly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Behth

customer_reviews.title: I wish there was a 8 1/2 option...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because I liked how they looked and wanted to incorporate them into my everyday wear. I wear a size 9 and really wanted to get a 8 1/2 due to the reviews saying the shoe was too big. Unfortunately there was no option for that only a size 8. So I got the 9 and it’s extra room and a little too big. Kinda looks like I have clown feet 🙃
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Had to exchange. :(
customer_reviews.text: The grey/gold shoe is really cute, it’s comfortable, but it’s not a woman’s shoe. It says women’s on the page but in the cart it comes up as a men’s shoe. I thought it was a typo and purchased anyway & got a men’s shoe. Naturally, it was too large so I had to do an exchange. Ladies, if you wanna order the gray/gold style anyway, subtract 2 from your normal shoe size and that’s the size you should get in men’s. (Ex. An 11 in women’s is a 9 in men’s.)
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Harbin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, supportive shoe
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. They are easy to slip on. I wanted a pair of shoes to travel with that I could slip on for a quick run. I hate having to pack my running shoes as "extra" shoes when I vacation. These shoes are perfect to walk around in but supportive enough when I take a short run in them.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers! Wide—downsize
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers—Great colors—match everything and look great with shorts. Very comfortable, but run very large! I’m an 11 in Nike’s and these were huge and very wide. I have a very narrow foot and had tons of room too, so I downsized 10.5. They are still a little roomy on the sides but don’t fall off when I’m walking. If you have normal-wide feet they’ll prob fit better! But they’re still really nice sneakers for the price...$50 on sale!
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but ripped easily
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old son was really excited to get these shoes. He said they were so comfortable and easy to put on. Unfortunately the first week he wore them he was playing a quick game of basketball at lunch while wearing them and when he stopped quickly his toe went right through the fabric of the shoe. I sewed them up but the sewing job only lasted two days. I will try to sew them again but the hole keeps getting bigger.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bartu

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Shipped super fast. Great quality with affordable price. Fit and very comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Ni

customer_reviews.title: All the stars!
customer_reviews.text: Beware: sizing in men's. Got an "8" but I am normally 9/10 in womens. The 8M was perfect. Absolutely obsessed. I have the women's Cloudfoam in all black. Comfort is unparalleled to any other shoe I've owned. Super light with tremendous support. Love all the color/style options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight slip-on shoe, more like a slipper
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes because I have owned several pairs of Adidas running shoes and wanted a slip-on shoe or a slide. These shoes are lightweight and really do not provide the support or strength of a running shoe. I find them large compared to my other Adidas running shoes in the same size. These feel more like slippers than shoes, and I need additional arch supports in the shoe to fill up the volume. They are attractive but not what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: iconoclast

customer_reviews.title: Order a size down but very comfy shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Depending on the shoe, I am either an 8.5 or a 9. I ended up getting an 8 in these. They are just a little big and wide so could have probably even ordered an 7.5. However, these sneakers have quickly become one of my favorites though. They’re easy to slip on and off and are very comfortable to walk around for a few hours in. I could see myself getting another pair in another color. They stay on your feet so you could jog in them as well. Will wear with or without socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable Sneaker EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was specifically looking for a slip on shoe for the ease of getting into them, but these aren't only convenient but SUPER comfortable. I am on my feet A LOT and can wear comfortably all day. Great shoe, well made & reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.author: lotusgirl916

customer_reviews.title: One shoe was smaller than the other.
customer_reviews.text: The right shoe was significantly smaller than the left. I looked inside both shoes and they were both labeled as size 11 shoes, however the left one fit and the right one felt like I was shoving my foot in a size 9. It’s upsetting because I got these in exchange for a pair of another pair of adidas. I really hoped these would work out but I’m definitely going to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Harbin

customer_reviews.title: Love !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: oh my gosh I love these. They are Sleek !!! They’ve got the cloud technologies. So the shoes are so light ,And breathable. This shoe has such a cozy cushion throughout the whole shoe. I wear shoes Bearfoot( no socks). So for me they are a teeny tiny little To big Now that I have break them in. But I don't use these for running or hiking. So it's no big deal. I wear 8.5 -9 in women's shoes. I bought 8.5. Would buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Thomas

customer_reviews.title: They are SOOOO comfy but run a little big
customer_reviews.text: I have a thing for Adidas Cloud Foam slip on sneakers and tried these since they are all black. I love them so much. I wish they didn't say Adidas across the top but because the lettering is in black, it isn't too noticeable. They feel like I am walking on a cloud. Order a whole size down though. I ordered half a size down and could have gone smaller but I wear with thick no show socks and they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly pillows for my feet
customer_reviews.text: Little pillows of heaven for my feet!! This is my second pair, and when I tell you I’m shoe picky.. I’m just that. I am a classic 9.5 regular width, and they fit perfect with socks. I am an emergency room nurse, at on my feet 12 hours a day and average no less that 6 miles walking per shift, not to mention all the up and down. My first pair still feel great but wanted a second to workout in. I wear them to work, lift weights and walk in these ( I’m no runner). They are AMAZING! And they slip on and off easily!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: SO COMFORTABLE. Best shoes I’ve owned for standing and walking 8+ hours a day. My feet don’t hurt anymore. I like the half sizes too.
customer_reviews.author: Cah987

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, cushiony and comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I stand and walk for about 10 hours a day at work. I needed a shoe that was lightweight yet had enough support. This shoe fits the bill. The heel is very cushioned and the design keeps my foot in place. These are very light. My toes didn’t even feel like I had shoes on. Only wore them for two days so far so we will see how long they last. But I’m very happy with them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Not cool
customer_reviews.text: As much as I was excited to get these shoes I wish I didn’t. They came in two different colors!!! As you can see from the pic. They are comfy and fit I wear a 7.5 but got a 7 cause they are stretchy. But unfortunately they will now be yard shoes :(
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Something isn't right
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a men's 9.5 and when the product shipped, it said my women's shoe was being shipped. My husband, son, and I have this exact shoe from a local shoe store, and my son outgrew his pair, but I assumed this was a safe purchase. The shoes say 9.5 inside, but they are too small for my son. I happen to wear 9.5 in women and they are too big. Not sure what we recieved but we won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Pay Attn to size in cart
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for running and they are great. Pay attention to the size that shows up in your shopping cart. I bought the black on black. On the ordering page I chose a size 8 because it says they’re for men. However, in my cart they showed up as 8 women’s. So I changed the size to a 10 (I am a woman and I wear a 10). The shoes that arrived were a 10 in women’s. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit, as well as, great looking!
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift and the recipient was very happy with them. They ordered a half size smaller than normal and they fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me, similar to a water shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Physically it is a good looking shoe. On is a bit different. The “cloud” or top of the shoe is so thin you can see your toe when you move in the shoe. Almost like water or swim shoes. I have many other shoes of similar design and I have very slim size 7 feet, it is just the way I believe they are meant to be. Just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Goode Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and nice looking show
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are very comfortable. I started using them while I was working out at home and they are light and fit as expected. However on some exercises my foot moved around a lot and I worry if I will not be able to run in them when the gyms open back up. However, this is a really good shoe and I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tera

customer_reviews.title: Men shoe...NOT women
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Women’s size 10. Box says size 10. Shoes are giant and all the tags on them say Male 9 1/2. Returning item because these are not a women’s size 10 shoe. I have other cloudform adidas in women’s size 10 and they are about 2 inches shorts and narrower. This is definitely a Men’s shoe
customer_reviews.author: momazon

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: I’m VERY disappointed, this is my second pair that I have bought of the same shoe. I bought a 9 like I normally wear and too big went done to a 8 1/2 and there still too big. I love the look and feel of the shoe but the size is too big can’t wear them. $40 down the drain...
customer_reviews.author: mojokid17

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these slip-on tennis for around the house. They fit as expected. This is the second pair I bought (different color). These wash great in the washer too. They hold up just fine. I hang dry them. Inserts come out if you need to swap them for custom inserts.
customer_reviews.author: B. Herrin

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday wear, maybe not the best for workouts.
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves these and has other similar styles from Adidas. He’s a big guy (6’3) with big feet (14.5) and these shoes continue to hold up well, even with mostly daily wear. He typically wears these for work and just day to day, not sure how well they’d work for more strenuous activity since there’s no lace to tighten them as they loosen a bit over time. Overall, he loves them and will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina in WA

customer_reviews.title: Great shows.
customer_reviews.text: I have bunion on the side of my foot that hurts very bad with normal tennis shoes. This shoe is probably the lightest I have found and for some reason does not put pressure on your feet like other shoes. It's the only one I can wear when the bunion starts to get inflamed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Siddle

customer_reviews.title: Runs big!!
customer_reviews.text: Tennis are cute, but they run big. I ordered a size up and they are huge on my feet. I would suggest ordering your actual size.
customer_reviews.author: Simone Munroe

customer_reviews.title: Wife and I love these!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes we have got in years AND they are slip ons! We are on our 6th pair so far. -1/2 star star because they simply don't last very long. -1/2 star for the price. A hole in the toe area is the most common problem with us anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Halfway smart most of the time.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these, but...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these, easy to put on, stylish and sooo comfortable! The only negative is, they are advertised as running shoes...for me they wouldn't work for running, not enough of that type of support for running. They are perfect for everyday shoes and walking shoes!
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear these for work and am on my feet all day. These are super comfortable, yet stylish. My feet don’t hurt after a 12 hr— that speaks for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing But Size Down!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I tried these on in-store first. I’m a 7 and a size 6 fits me perfectly in these. These are so comfy and match with everything. For white sneakers they keep pretty clean but the mesh fabric is no match for any moisture at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Work as intended
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice fit (maybe a tad large) but could be better with heel support and breathing. Overall a good product for non intensive outdoor activities. Overall very comfortable and performs as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Janeiro

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the black version of these shoes a few months ago and they are my go-to shoes now! They are so comfortable! Looked on Amazon and sure enough, there were more colors at a good price so I bought these and one other color!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the black version of these shoes a few months ago and they are my go-to shoes now! They are so comfortable! Looked on Amazon and sure enough, there were more colors at a good price so I bought these and one other color!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Get a half size smaller.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 6 so I bought a 6, even though they fit there's still a half an inch of space that isn't filled. I would suggest ordering a half size smaller than what you usually wear unless you don't mind the extra space. Other than that it's a great looking shoe and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like a cloud
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are so comfortable. I highly recommend, unless you’re going to use them on hills. The front mesh makes it a bit difficult to walk down hills. I thought my foot would bust through. Other than that they really are perfect slip ons. I recommend. I also recommend that people read. These are clearly sized in men’s. If you’re a woman figure out the sizing difference. I’m an 11 in women and the 10 in men’s fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are not true adidas
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shoes but I have a pair I bought from adidas and they are different from the ones I bought here. The insoles are not as soft as the real adidas and the pattern is different and the stretchy adidas band moves on the fake ones and they don’t move on the real ones..not bad for the price but I just wanted people to know that they are not true adidas
customer_reviews.author: Christie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for work shoes, I have a VERY labor intensive job in the heat. These are super comfy, light weight so my feet can breathe, and hold up even to the most extreme wear. Will definitely be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: So long Nikes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair about a month ago. No more Nikes for me. The cloud foam is the most comfortable sole I have ever worn. I had to get another pair. You won’t be disappointed with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: J Stefanik

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This shoes fits perfectly. I was worried at first ordering as I did not know how it’ll fit me. I haven’t been to the Mall since Jan/Feb this year. Most of my shopping are done on line. It is so hard to guess sometimes on how each product will fit. As some products runs either too small or too big. This one fits perfectly. Very comfortable. Great for going for a walk.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Leonard

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE!
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought a different color of these shoes around Christmas time and I fell in love with them. Once I found out that they were on sale, I had to get another pair! Personally, I think these are WAY BETTER than sketchers.
customer_reviews.author: Breann

customer_reviews.title: FIX YOUR DESCRIPTION TO MENS SHOES
customer_reviews.text: Clearly described as women’s shoes and received men’s shoes. Twice my size, I’m trying to exchange or return. So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon newland

customer_reviews.title: Mens not womans
customer_reviews.text: The listing said womans but they are mens. Then I called to tell amazon they are mens that the deception is wrong and needs to be changed to mens. They are still listed as womans.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My roommate had a pair of the previous model of these shoes that he loves and wore to death. I got him these and he loved them and they fit exactly the same as his old pair.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: They seem to run small and narrow. I’d say go up at least a half size. The band is super tight too. Hoping they will stretch a little over time.
customer_reviews.author: clm626

customer_reviews.title: lasted two weeks
customer_reviews.text: these shoes lasted two weeks before the seams at the toe completely split on both shoes. Usually have very good luck with Adidas products but this one was a dud.
customer_reviews.author: N. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe , but very wide large toe box Not sure they will work. I’ll update later. Update unbelievable comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are CRAZY comfortable. This is my second pair of slip-on Adidas. They are theed most worn shoes I own because you can just slip them on and go.
customer_reviews.author: Hotlayout

customer_reviews.title: Order down a half size then enjoy some of the comfiest shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite shoes. They are ridiculously comfortable. I had the black and pink pair for over a year but they were a a but too large and as I wore them they got more loose. I bought this pair a half size down and they are just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Ward

customer_reviews.title: These are Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: These athletic shoes are great! They not only look good - they fit amazing. They stay on well - even though there are no laces. The comfort level is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M F

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are exactly what I was looking for. They are very comfortable. Great to wear all day long and you don't have to deal with retying the laces. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes the only problem I am having is my right shoe is tighter around the band area but other than that I love them!
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoes Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I own. I am definitely going to buy more of this style. I walked all day in these and my feet, back and knees felt great. Super fast shipping and Great price
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is WAY off
customer_reviews.text: This item was labeled size 6.5 US women on the tag on inside the shoe. My husband could put the shoes on and he wears a men’s US 12. So... not even close. Returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing several different pairs of Lite Racers for a year. This is a very nice shoe. The soles do come out when I pull my foot out though but that is every model.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Simon

customer_reviews.title: Run big
customer_reviews.text: Size down half a size. I wish I would have listened to the other reviews they run big.
customer_reviews.author: brandy

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy shoes. I have not ran with them yet but they are very comfortable for walking. Easy to put in and out. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: era70

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable pair of shoes I have ever owned! Like walking on clouds. I wish the colors were cuter, but 10/10 for functionality and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Mens sizes
customer_reviews.text: They are mens! Heads up ladies!! Other than that they are awesome. I actually ordered for my son. But his foot is too fat.
customer_reviews.author: Kendelrose

customer_reviews.title: Easy wear!
customer_reviews.text: Loved all them for the price the feel and the style! I’m always a mom on the go and these are the perfect shoes to wear with anything and easy to put on
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Juarez

customer_reviews.title: It’s like wearing slippers with the cloudform support!
customer_reviews.text: I have Achilles tendinitis in both ankles/heels and find it very hard to find comfortable shoes that don’t rub on them. I have finally found some good looking and comfortable tennis shoes! I absolutely love these shoes, one of the best purchases I’ve made all year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Womens Adidas Lite Racer Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Comfy , sporty , great fit and color. Price super nice. Delivery was fast with Prime and boxed well by the Vendor and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth & Sandi Jones

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: I love so much , this is 2nd pairs. So comfortable and light. Slip on shoes. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Reah

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: True to size. I should have purchased an 8, but sometimes 8 1/2 work too. Order your true size. I love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: These run B I G
customer_reviews.text: Wow do these run big and look super doofy. Sorta reminds me of Will Farrell for some reason. Yes, I did buy the right size. Sure, buy them if you wanna look like a clown.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Jo

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stylish shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I normally wear either a 7.5 or an 8 (women’s) and so i got the 7.5 and they’re perfect. These shoes are so so comfortable I find myself forgetting to take them off sometimes when I get home.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, very comfy. You can use one size down But I prefer bigger ones to use with thicker socks. Loved ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Yhanne Brode

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, comfortable BUT very thin and not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 13 yr old for back to school. It’s only been 1 month and his big toe went right through the fabric today. May be a good shoe for occasional wear but not every day. Once the little bit of foam lining wears out it’s just a matter of time before your get a tear. Very comfortable and light weight but not durable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrana Axford

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes but they were too big for me. Now I see that their men shoes😩
customer_reviews.author: nicole Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up
customer_reviews.text: Extremely low on the ankle. Ordered my size and they're way too small. But lightweight and seems they'd be comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are the most amazing shoes I have ever worn. I need to wear shoes most of the day, due to Plantar Fasciitis, and these feel amazing. Doesn’t feel like I am wearing shoes at all, although I have the support I need. Light and airy too.
customer_reviews.author: PLM

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I have two pair, so I don't wear just one pair out too soon. They are comfortable, light weight, and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jackson

customer_reviews.title: What is Love? Baby you hurt me!
customer_reviews.text: The look is everything. The fit.... not so much. I really love these shows. But it is a struggle for me to get them on. And once they’re on they are very tight around the top. It would be a very comfortable shoe if the top stretched like the elastic band. There just isn’t any give and that makes me sad because I really love this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kai McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sport/casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I wear them to workout, or run around town. I have them in Black/coral as well and get tons of compliments!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome sneakers, my second pair actually. Very comfortable and what I was looking for in a laceless shoe.
customer_reviews.author: P.M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Love These Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my second pair—I wear them for walking. Comfortable and supportive for a slip on.
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: Sons favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My sons favorite shoes! Wore a hole in the last pair he sure them everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Aim

customer_reviews.title: Order a 1/2 size down 🤗
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size down as per the reviews and they fit me perfect. Usually wear I size 7 and purchased a 6 1/2. As these shoes don’t have to be laced they fit so perfect it’s crazy.
customer_reviews.author: bcm

customer_reviews.title: No lace cool
customer_reviews.text: Baught as a gift sis in law loved them comfy and no lace wow so cool
customer_reviews.author: DIAna

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS MEN SIZE NOT WOMEN I selected women 7.5 got a 7.5 men’s
customer_reviews.text: This is not a women’s shoe size I didn’t pay attention to the other reviews thinking I made the right selection but they sent a 7.5 in men’s not women THIS IS MEN SIZE NOT WOMEN
customer_reviews.author: Jocy Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Need smaller size
customer_reviews.text: I need to exchange the pair I received for a size smaller because the shoes run so large. When I try to replace with the same shoe, smaller size, I'm not able too. I can see the size & style I need on Amazon, but am not able to exchange it???!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. I ordered them to use hiking on a trip that has been cancelled. I am so glad I have them for walks without socks. Comfy I want to order another pair!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My second pair!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this show, I now have them in 2 colors!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wife for Christmas and she loves them. I tried them on and am going to buy me a pair. They’re extremely light, as if you were walking on clouds if you will.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: rong  shose

customer_reviews.title: Band area its too tight
customer_reviews.text: The band area its a little too tight. But the zise fits good.
customer_reviews.author: jorge flores

customer_reviews.title: Make feet look deformed and oddly long and pointy.
customer_reviews.text: They were weird looking on my feet. Too long and pointy...
customer_reviews.author: angela hudenets

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable. Easy to get on. Even on my leg that is healing. On my second pair. So in love with the ease and comfort of these slip on sneaks.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisitna Martini

customer_reviews.title: Slip on and off without using hands
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! So comfortable and easy to slip on and off. I work in healthcare. Since COVID-19 these shoes are great to be able to slip off without touching them with my hands before entering my home.
customer_reviews.author: Crimson Yazar

customer_reviews.title: These are nice!
customer_reviews.text: A little big but still works. Looks good and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Fit is perfect and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been through many athletic shoes and these are by far my favorite. The fit is perfect. These shoes fit true to size and are extremely comfortable. I’ve found it extra convenient that these shoes do not have laces.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ren

customer_reviews.title: The sneakers are deceiving. Good
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and love how comfortable they are
customer_reviews.author: CARLOS

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes. Wrong size.
customer_reviews.text: It said I was getting a women’s 7.5 and I received a men’s 7.5.... was supposed to be a gift for my mother and that didn’t happen. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyona Colbert

product_meta.title: adidas Women's Lite Racer Adapt Running Shoe
product_meta.description: These men's shoes transform a street running style. A sock-like fabric outer material wraps around the foot. The ultra-soft Cloudfoam padding in the midsole and outer sole provides all-day comfort.
feature_bullets: Core ftw men sport inspired adidas
The adidas brand has a long history and deep-rooted Connection with sport. Everything we do is rooted in sport
